@kooninjz - I had the same problem (I only wanted to play Titan Quest, not Immortal Throne.) Make sure you follow the full install instructions in the nfo file (install both titan quest & immortal throne, then run the update). This will get rid of the disc error. Works perfectly! Thanks ForbiddenSoul

Fucking CRC error.

-Install Titan Quest, ignore the crc error on Creatures.arc 
-Install Immortal throne
-Start the update in the immortal folder (C:Program Files (x86)THQTitan Quest Immortal ThronePatch) it will overwrite the corrupted file
